column2: National Energy Services Reunited Corp. is a holding company, which engages in the provision of oilfield services. The company is headquartered in Houston, Texas and currently employs 3,590 full-time employees. The firm provides the production services, such as cementing, coiled tubing, filtration, completions, stimulation and fracturing, and nitrogen services. The firm also helps its customers to access the reservoirs by providing drilling and evaluation services, such as drilling downhole tools, directional drilling fishing tools, testing services, wireline, slickline, fluids and rig services.
